altTitles.ja: 絶滅寸前動物ハッチンパモス

description.en:
The Hacchin-Pamos is a critically-endangered species. Let's find out why.

A daily comic series from Q-Rais.

In Tokyo in the year 2020, Minato Sahashi has failed the college entrance exam twice, is awkward around women, and he's unemployed. He could never stand up to his mother or little sister growing up, a trend that continues to this day. In reality, Minato is extremely intelligent, yet his inability to cope under pressure results in his constant failure and he has been branded an idiot and loser by many as a result.  
  
One day, Minato meets a girl named Musubi, who literally falls from the sky. Minato soon learns that she is one of the "Sekirei" and he is her "Ashikabi", a human with special genes that allows them to "wing" (form a contract with) a Sekirei. This binds the Sekirei to him and allows them to use their full power in the elimination battle with other Sekirei. Made up of cute girls, buxom women, and bishounen, the Sekirei fight in a dangerous and sometimes deadly competition known as "The Game" or the "Sekirei Plan" organized by Hiroto Minaka, the chairman and founder of the mysterious and powerful MBI Corporation.  
  
Minato soon learns that being the partner of a beautiful girl is not all fun and games, especially when he discovers that an Ashikabi can have more than one Sekirei partner; and that's where the real trouble starts.

Heo Jeong-woo, a high school student who is bullied by a girl in his class for his weakness.
 
Han Bo-ra, a transfer student, comes to Jeong-woo's class, where he was spending his miserable days.

Jeong-woo feels a strong sense of déjà vu when he sees the child with straight black hair and stains on his legs. Sure enough, Han Bo-ra, who has subdued the arguing classmates, asks them.

"'Have you ever seen a child similar to me?

Jeong-woo decides to approach Bo-ra, who might be able to correct what is wrong...

---

- Alternative Official Raw - [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?originalProductId=522173)
description.ko:
같은 반 여자애에게 약점을 잡혀 괴롭힘 당하는 고등학생 '허정우'. 피폐한 나날을 보내던 정우의 반에 전학생 '한보라'가 온다. 까만 생머리와 다리에 얼룩을 가진 그 아이를 보고 정우는 강한 기시감을 느낀다. 아니나다를까, 시비 거는 반 아이들을
제압한 한보라는 그들에게 묻는다. '나랑 비슷한 애 본 적 있어?' 어쩌면 꼬인 것을 바로잡아줄 보라에게 정우는 접근하기로 하는데...

altTitles.en: Everyone Is Under the Baby’s Feet
Everything Is Under the Baby's Feet

altTitles.ja: すべてはお嬢様の手の中に

description.en: Stella, the beloved princess of Tyrien, was imprisoned all her life before being used in an eerie sacrifice. After her consciousness fades away, she wakes up to find herself hatching from an egg as a child! Despite her initial bewilderment, Stella quickly adapts to her new life as "Leticia" and becomes attached to Beth, a kind professor who may hold the key to finding out who and what she is. But does Leticia have what it takes to uncover the secrets behind both her lives?
description.fr: Stella, la princesse bien-aimée de Tyrien, a été emprisonnée toute sa vie avant d'être utilisée pour un étrange sacrifice. Après avoir perdu connaissance, elle se réveille et découvre qu'elle a éclos d'un œuf en tant qu'enfant ! Malgré sa perplexité initiale, Stella s'adapte rapidement à sa nouvelle vie en tant que « Leticia » et s'attache à Beth, une gentille professeure qui pourrait bien détenir la clé pour découvrir qui elle est et ce qu'elle est. Mais Leticia a-t-elle ce qu'il faut pour découvrir les secrets qui se cachent derrière ses deux vies ?

altTitles.ja: カタブツ系女子に告白してみた

altTitles.en: I Tried Confessing My Love to a Serious Girl

description.en: Although she's pretty, she's widely rumoured to be the school's number one straight-laced girl. So when I gathered up my courage to confess to her…‽
description.ja: 美人だけど学校一『カタブツ』だと噂の女子に勇気を出して告白すると…!?
description.pt-br: Embora ela seja bonita, há rumores de que ela é a garota certinha número um da escola. Então, quando criei coragem para confessar a ela...‽

title.en: The Male Leads Were Stolen by an Extra

altTitles.en: The Male Leads Were Taken Away by the Extra
The Male Leads Were Stolen by the Extra

description.en:
A woman who has lost her male leads to an extra who did not appear in the original story... That's me.

Selonia fell into a coma on the way back from defeating the Demon King. After wandering through death for several months, she survived, but what? 

“I want you to break off the engagement. I want to hurry up to marry Grace.” 

“I want you to pretend my knight’s oath to you didn't happen.” 

“Give me back my heart. I’ll give it to Grace.” 

The fiancé who was the male lead, the paladin and the dragon who were the sub-male leads, and the fellows all turned away. These reckless bastards! There was a lot of cursing, but what can I do to stop it? I was trying to start a new life in a cool way. By the way… 

“Do you know me?” 

How is the dead demon king alive? 

“What, I don’t know…”

“No, you know me. tell me Who am I?” 

To make matters worse, the Demon King, who has no memory, sticks to my side and does not leave. Inevitably, I tried my best to prevent the return of the Demon King. 

“How can I always hold your hand?” 

Why is it not enough to spit out vulgar words? 

“Are you going to kill all those who left you? Just speak.” 

He’s even going to kill the male leads for me!
A car date with my favourite senpai ♡
description.ja: 大好きなセンパイとドライブデート♡

description.en:
Saeki is an ordinary high school boy with a girlfriend, Sara, who is the heiress of the Saionji Group, and whose beauty and intelligence are the envy of everyone.

Sara seems like a prim and proper young lady to other people, but the two share a secret! Because of the secret, Saeki can't fully commit, but Sara prepares lunch for him, she hugs him to deepen their relationship, and she acts like she's trying to seduce Saeki to corrupt him!!!?

What is the secret of their relationship and what is Sara's true purpose…!!? A love comedy about a young lady disguising herself, and a boy in an enviable situation!

(Source: ComicWalker)

Based on the ero doujinshi by the author.

description.ja:
誰もが羨む美貌と知性を持つ、西園寺グループのお嬢様・紗良…を彼女に持つ冴えない男子高校生・佐伯。

他人にはクール＆ツンしか見せない絶対零度のお嬢様な紗良と仲睦まじい関係を築いているが、実は二人にはある秘密があった!!
そんな秘密を抱えているのもあり、中々踏み出せない佐伯をよそに、紗良は彼のためにお弁当を用意したり、関係を深めるために抱きしめ合ったり、佐伯を堕とそうとするようなアプローチをしかけてくる!!!?

二人の恋人関係の秘密とはいったい、そして紗良の目的とは…!!? お嬢様との羨ましすぎる、複雑Hな偽装ラブコメ!!!!

title.en: I'm a Japanese but I died and got reincarnated as a Filipino!

description.en: Have you dreamt of dying and reincarnating in a world full of fantasy and magic? Having an adventure with your companions and raiding dungeons together? That's the ideal Isekai dream, but this story is different. (PINOSAISEI) I'm a Japanese, but I died and got reincarnated as a Filipino. It follows the story of Sakai Shuichi, who died in a truck accident but reincarnated as a Filipino. In the Philippines, his name is Seth Severino. His goal is to go back to Japan as soon as possible. But how can he do that when he became poor in a third-world country?

altTitles.vi: Sứa không thể bơi trong đêm

altTitles.en: Jellyfish Can't Swim in the Night

altTitles.ja: 夜のクラゲは泳げない

description.en: Four girls, an illustrator, a former idol, a VTuber, and a composer, form an anonymous artist group called "JELEE", each pursuing their artistic dreams while supporting one another.

title.en: I Was Reborn as His Highness the Prince's Little Evil Dragon

altTitles.zh: 我重生成为王子殿下的小恶龙

altTitles.zh-ro: Wo Chongsheng Chengwei Wangzi Dianxia De Xiao E Long

description.en: An 18-year-old young man who lived a peaceful and normal life is murdered by an unknown man. He is reincarnated as an evil little dragon who is the pet of the crown prince of a magical kingdom. He discovers that the prince is actually his reincarnated assassin, and that he has a secret mission to destroy the kingdom. The little dragon will have to face the dangers and intrigues of the royal court, while at the same time trying to get closer to the prince and discover his true feelings. Will he be able to stop the prince's evil plan and find his happy ending?
description.fr: Après 18 ans de vie paisible, j'ai été tué du jour au lendemain et transformé en dragon. Moi, Bian Yurong, un étudiant, doté d'un excellent caractère et d'une grande intégrité, qui obtenait des notes parfaites à la fois en études et en affaires, j'ai fini par mourir des mains d'une personne malveillante. Ce qui est encore plus triste, c'est que je suis devenu le boss final du jeu auquel je jouais, le Dragon noir ! Puisque je connais déjà clairement la fin, je dois changer mon destin ! Attendez, pourquoi ce jeune prince qui est chargé de m'élever se comporte-t-il de façon si étrange ?

description.en:
Set in the France 1835. The pretty Rose Dupre is bullied and called the witch's daughter. People say her mother is a witch who kills and eats humans. However, Marie and Peter don't believe all those rumors and decide to protect Rose… But what if the rumors are true?  

---

description.id: Di kota Prancis yang dilanda ketakutan, Rose Dupre diintimidasi sebagai putri penyihir. Marie dan Pierre tidak percaya rumor seperti itu pada awalnya. Tetapi ketika gelombang kematian aneh menyapu, ketiga anak itu tidak lagi aman dari mata yang waspada. Bisakah Rose selamat dari kutukan sihir dan kecurigaan? Sebuah kisah gothic yang luas namun penuh warna dimulai.
description.zh:
在充满恐惧流言的法国小镇上，Rose Dupre作为女巫的女儿被欺凌。朋友玛丽和皮特起初并不相信这样的谣言。但是，当一波奇怪的死亡浪潮席卷而来时，三个孩子再也逃不过警惕的眼睛了。罗斯能从魔法和怀疑的诅咒中幸存下来吗?一个宏大而丰富多彩的哥特式故事开始了。

Source : Bato

description.en:
After countless regressions, Persepe finally conquers all five male protagonists in a harrowing reverse harem game. Just when she thinks she’s free, a message appears:  

*Secret Mode unlocked! Find the true male lead to escape.*  

Hope reignites — she only needs to woo the real protagonist to return to her original world. But there’s one problem...

"So… who’s the real male lead?"

With no clear answers and hidden challenges, Persepe must navigate shifting alliances, cryptic clues, and her own growing feelings. 

Can she uncover the truth and finally break free? Or will she remain trapped in the game forever?
description.fr:
Précépé, coincée dans un jeu otome sombre, a enduré d’innombrables régressions.

Finalement, elle réussit à conquérir les cinq héros masculins !

Pleine d’espoir de pouvoir enfin quitter le jeu, c’est à ce moment-là qu’un message apparaît :

“Trouve le véritable héros masculin”, annonçant l’ouverture d’un mode secret !

Si elle conquiert le véritable héros, elle pourra rentrer chez elle !

Mais alors, qui est ce véritable héros ?
description.ko:
피폐 역하렘 게임에 빙의되어 수많은 회귀를 반복한 프레세페. 결국 다섯명의 남자 주인공을 공략 하는데에 성공하는데!

게임을 드디어 나갈 수 있다는 희망을 가졌지만 그 순간, 진짜 남자 주인공을 찾으라는 안내 메세지와 함께 열린 시크릿 모드!

진짜 남자주인공을 공략하기만 하면 돌아갈 수 있겠네!

그래서, 진짜 남자 주인공이 누군데?

title.en: The Villainess Doesn't Need a New Husband!

altTitles.ko: 악녀님에겐 새 남편 따위 필요하지 않아요!

altTitles.ja: 悪女様には新しい夫なんて必要ありません

description.en:
What kind of dogs are there?

"The person who will be my groom is already dead!"

It's unfair that she died so absurdly, but she possessed the villain. And that, of course, while holding a 'soul wedding'! All he has is a sunfish body and a run-down mansion.

No, the dead groom isn't rich, but he even has debts? It's the original, it's Nabal, and I have to find my way of life first!

Meanwhile, the Duke of Fitzren came to visit her, claiming to be a close friend of her late husband. If this man touches the hearts of modern people by making warm bath water and iced americano, I think he can be a good shield to overcome this harsh world...

"Please be my fake mistress!"
description.fr: Qu'est-ce qui se passe ? J'ai transmigré dans le corps de la méchante au moment où elle a conclu un <Mariage d'âme>. Mon futur mari est déjà mort. Tout ce que j'ai,  c'est un corps sexy et une énorme dette ! Quoi, mon défunt mari n'était pas riche ? "Que dois-je faire pour vivre confortablement en tant que méchante ?" "Et l'Americano glacé ? Et le bain chaud ? "Je veux vivre comme ça !" J'ai essayé de faire du grabuge pour que personne ne puisse m'approcher.... "Si tu veux, je vais te sortir de là." "Si tu laisses ton siège et...." "C'est juste que l'une des rumeurs qui nous entourent va se concrétiser." Un homme est soudain apparu devant moi. "Je veux t'engager. Sois ma fausse maîtresse."

description.en: A chain-smoking catgirl struggles with her cigarette addiction.
description.ja: マナーやモラルなんて関係ねえ！クズねこの送るヤニまみれでお下品な日常をご覧ください。一応、妹とか普通にかわいいキャラもでてくるから！単行本でしか見れない貴重な喫煙シーンとかたぶん描くんで、予約してくれたらありがてーにゃ(笑)

description.en: A cat spirit, while stealing the famed Heavenly Bright Pearl, was injured heavily by the spirit Diting and turned back into a cat. While wandering the streets, he was adopted by Luo Xiaobai, and became Luo Xiaohei. Their story begins now.

A male engineer transmigrated into another world, and became a prince. This place strikingly resembles the Middle Ages of Europe, but at the same time, it seems kind of different? Witches truly exist, and they even possess magic powers! Magic powers are productive forces! Save the witches, liberate the productive forces! Open map, fight demons, break conspiracies, climb up the science and technology tree, and open the path of hardcore ‘farming’!
description.ru: Чэн Янь прошел сквозь время и попал в мир, подобный Средневековой Европе, став Роландом, 4-м принцем королевства. Но этот мир не такой, к какому он уже привык. Ведьмы и магия здесь — нормальное явление. Сможет ли Роланд заполучить трон короля и решить выпавшие на его долю проблемы? Только его опыт современных технологий и помощь ведьм, известных как «слуги Дьявола», позволят ему добиться успеха!

title.en: Won't She Speak Well, That Girl Who Woke Up From a Dream?

altTitles.ja-ro: Yume kara Sameta Ano Ko to wa Kitto Umaku Shaberenai

altTitles.ja: 夢から覚めたあの子とはきっと上手く喋れない

title.en: Uketsukejou ni Kokuhaku Shitakute Guild ni Kayoitsumetara Eiyuu ni Natteta

altTitles.ja: 受付嬢に告白したくてギルドに通いつめたら英雄になってた

altTitles.en: I Wanted to Confess to the Receptionist, but When I Went to the Guild, I Became a Hero

altTitles.ja-ro: Uketsukejou ni Kokuhaku Shitakute Girudo ni Kayoitsumetara Eiyuu ni Natteta

altTitles.vi: Vì Muốn Tỏ Tình Với Cô Lễ Tân Nên Tôi Thường Xuyên Lui Tới Guild Rồi Dần Trở Thành Dũng Giả

description.en:
**I Became the Strongest Hero by Frequenting the Guild Just to See the Receptionist!**

Jade, who aims to become the strongest adventurer, arrives at the guild and falls in love at first sight with the receptionist! Determined to talk to her, he realizes the only way to do so is to complete as many quests as possible. Thus begins Jade's journey, driven by love, to become the ultimate hero through relentless questing and adventure.
description.id:
**Saya Menjadi Pahlawan Terkuat dengan Sering Mengunjungi Guild Hanya untuk Melihat Resepsionis!**

Jade, yang ingin menjadi petualang terkuat, tiba di guild dan jatuh cinta pada pandangan pertama dengan resepsionis! Bertekad untuk berbicara dengannya, ia menyadari bahwa satu-satunya cara untuk melakukannya adalah dengan menyelesaikan quest sebanyak mungkin. Maka dimulailah perjalanan Jade, yang didorong oleh cinta, untuk menjadi pahlawan utama melalui pencarian dan petualangan tanpa henti.

title.en: The Devil Who Kisses My Feet

altTitles.en: The Demon Who Kisses My Foot

description.en:
Maria, who is in an unhappy marriage with her sadistic husband, unexpectedly receives news. Lowell, her husband's half-brother, had returned from the battlefield.

 Maria, who had personally educated and raised him, learned that he  was no longer the small child or immature boy Maria remembered. He had the appearance of a grown man. 

With his appearance, a rift slowly began to appear in the seemingly peaceful Marquis Redford.

Where would this relationship, which should never have begun, end?
description.pl: Kiedy młoda Maria zostaje wydana za mąż za Jacquesa Redforda, bogatego szlachcica, jest wdzięczna, że wydaje się on być łagodny i wyrozumiały. Jednak posiadłość Redfordów skrywa mroczne sekrety, a życie Marii zmienia się na gorsze, gdy na jaw wychodzą sadystyczne upodobania jej męża. Nie mając nikogo, na kim mogłaby się oprzeć, Maria znajduje pocieszenie w towarzystwie nieślubnego przyrodniego brata Jacquesa, Lowella. Teraz, gdy Lowell wrócił do domu jako bohater wojenny, czy może uratować Marię przed jej okrutnym losem?

description.en: Jake, a seemingly average office worker, unexpectedly finds himself thrust into a fantasy world teeming with dangers and opportunities. Rather than succumbing to fear, Jake thrives in this unfamiliar realm. As he navigates the expansive multiverse, his power grows and he transforms—evolving from a mundane office worker into a true apex hunter.

altTitles.ja: 異剣戦記ヴェルンディオ

altTitles.es-la: Völundio: Saga de las espadas divergentes

altTitles.vi: Volundio - Sử thi về mộng kiếm

description.en:
On a desperate battlefield... I'll start running a tavern!

Cleo, a man who has been a mercenary for 10 years, meets a mysterious girl named Kohaku. In order to survive on the battlefield, where "different swords" with great power are flying around, the two of them start running a "tavern" where soldiers gather!
description.ja:
絶望の戦場で…酒場経営はじめます！

傭兵歴10年の男・クレオは
不思議な少女・コハクと出会う。
強大な力を持つ「異剣」が飛び交う
戦場を生き延びるために、
二人が始めたのは――
兵士たちが集う「酒場」の経営！？
description.es-la:
En un campo de batalla desesperado... ¡Empieza a dirigir una taberna!

Cleo, un hombre con 10 años de experiencia como mercenario
Conoce a una misteriosa chica llamada Kohaku.
Para sobrevivir en el campo de batalla donde vuelan las poderosas "otras espadas".
Lo que los dos empiezan a hacer es... Dirigir una "taberna" donde se reúnen los soldados.

title.en: The Male Leads Trapped in My House

description.en:
I reincarnated as the heiress of a powerful conglomerate family in a novel.  
The problem is, this world is about to be destroyed by monstrous viruses.  

With nothing but money to spare, I quickly bought a mansion in the countryside to build a shelter to escape the monsters…  
But the world ended far sooner than I had anticipated. Damn it!  

*  

On top of that, somehow, the male leads ended up trapped in my house with me.  
And these guys don’t seem to have any intention of leaving.  
Why do they look like they have no plans to go to the female lead?  

“Who exactly are you?”  
“You seem like someone who knew the world was going to end beforehand.”  

They were full of questions about me, but I couldn’t answer them. They wouldn’t believe me anyway.  
Right now, all I see them as is a good source of labor.  

“Alright, let’s work. You need to earn your keep for what you eat!”  

If I can find the cure for the virus causing the apocalypse, this hellish time will finally end.  
So, until then, I’ll make use of the male leads and hang on!  

*  

But one problem has come up.  
It turns out that this old mansion I purchased is far more suspicious than I thought.  
What on earth is happening in my house?

altTitles.th: สงครามนักรบผู้หวนคืน

description.en:
After saving one world, warrior Kim Minsu returns to Earth only to find that he’s lost everything… so he decides to destroy the world he used to call home.

In his rampage, he kills teenager Jeongsu Park and his family. But instead of dying normally, Jeongsu is transported to another world, where he finds that he’s now a warrior himself. After killing the demon king of this alternate world and honing his skills as a warrior, Jeongsu returns to earth, hell-bent on revenge against Minsu.

As the two warriors fight with the fate of their country in the balance, who will emerge victorious?
description.fr:
Après avoir sauvé un monde, le héros Minsu Kim revient sur Terre et découvre qu'il a tout perdu. Il décide donc de détruire le monde qu'il avait l'habitude d'appeler ‘chez lui’. Dans son saccage, il tue le héros Jeongsu Park, mais au lieu de mourir normalement, Jeongsu est transporté dans un autre monde. Après avoir tué le roi démon de ce monde alternatif et grandi en tant que héros, Jeongsu revient sur terre, déterminé à se venger de Minsu. Alors que les deux héros se battent avec le destin de leur pays en jeu, qui sortira vainqueur?

被黑化勇士们毁灭的世界，
绝望之中最后的勇士归来！
经历千辛万苦最终回到地球的勇士金闵洙，可等他的却是人们冰冷的眼光和父母双亡的事实，绝望的他决定毁灭整个世界。男主朴正秀的家人也被陷入到了这场灾难之中…就在这时，朴正秀也被传送到了异世！勇士朴正秀能否拯救这个世界呢？

description.pt-br:
Após salvar um mundo, o guerreiro Kim Minsu retorna à Terra apenas para descobrir que perdeu tudo… então ele decide destruir o mundo que costumava chamar de lar.

Em sua fúria, ele mata o adolescente Jeongsu Park e sua família. Mas, em vez de morrer normalmente, Jeongsu é transportado para outro mundo, onde descobre que agora é um guerreiro. Depois de matar o rei demônio desse mundo alternativo e aperfeiçoar suas habilidades como guerreiro, Jeongsu retorna à Terra, determinado a se vingar de Minsu.

Enquanto os dois guerreiros lutam com o destino do país em jogo, quem sairá vitorioso?
description.zh-hk:
為了報仇雪恨這唯一念頭而拯救異世界的勇士，雖然拯救了自己，卻拯救不了原本世界的他，決心要殺光毀滅世界的勇士們。 這是關於沒有幸福結局的冷酷現實，以及殺勇者們的勇者的故事。

description.en:
Masato Wakamatsu, 16 years old, is working at the beach one summer. Having made a bad impression on his classmate/crush Miyuki Kashima, he makes a pass at another pretty girl. To Masato's shock, the girl turns out to be his younger stepsister Miyuki (15), who has been living abroad with their father for the past six years.  
As school progresses, Masato starts dating Miyuki Kashima. He and his sister Miyuki are living alone together, and he is troubled by his conflicting emotions: filial and romantic feelings toward a sister who may or may not know she is not related to him by blood.  
  
This manga was very popular in Japan.

---
- **Won the Shogakukan Manga Award for Shonen/Shojo in 1982, along with Adachi's very popular, Touch**

Three friends get together for an unfortunate occasion. Each of them is facing a difficult moment, between finished or complicated loves. But even if it is difficult and it seems to you that your heart is about to dry up, you can always find new light and hope if you reunite with people you love to eat rice together.

altTitles.ja: 履いてください、鷹峰さん

description.en:
Takamine Takane is the goddess of her high school. With perfect grades, athletic prowess, and unrivaled beauty, this student council president sits at the top of the social pyramid. And then there's Shirota Koushi, a below-average student with no friends or social prospects to speak of. One day, Shirota-kun accidentally sees Takamine-san's naked breasts and finds out the secret behind her unbelievable success. From then on, his school life changes.

“Become my closet!”

Shirota is forced into underwear-putting-on servitude!?
___
[Alt Official English (Yen Press)](https://yenpress.com/series/please-put-them-on-takamine-san)
description.ja: 生徒会長の鷹峰さんはスクールカーストのトップ中のトップ、神！　対して、友達も存在感も皆無の白田くんはある日、鷹峰さんの生おっぱいを見てしまう。そこから変わるスクールライフ。――「私にパンツを履かせなさい」なんと鷹峰さんは”未だ穢れ知らぬ乙女（エターナル・バージンロード）”という能力でパンツを脱いで時をかける少女だった。ノーパンではいられない鷹峰さんのクローゼットとして白田くんは鷹峰さんにモモ色おねだりをされ続けるハメに…。
description.ru:
Президент студсовета, Такамине-сан находится на самом верху школьной иерархии. Она — практически бог!  
Однажды Широта-кун случайно увидел обнажённую грудь Такамине. С того момента его школьная жизнь изменилась.  
- "Надень мои трусики для меня"   
В итоге Широта-кун оказался в стеснительном положении из-за розовых пристрастий Такамине-сан.  
  


---

  
**Links:**  
- [![](https://i.imgur.com/dQCXZkU.png) Mangaka's Twitter](https://twitter.com/yuichi_hiiragi)

description.pt-br:
A presidente do conselho estudantil, Takamine-san, está no topo da hierarquia escolar, uma deusa! Um dia, Shirota-kun acidentalmente vê os seios nus de Takamine-san. A partir de então, sua vida escolar mudou, sendo chantageado para uma vida de servidão a Takamine-san. ― “Coloque minha calcinha para mim”
Shirota-kun acabou em uma situação difícil devido aos favores cor-de-rosa de Takamine-san.

description.en: Hiroki Endou's latest series tells the story of two old friends, Meguru Takayanagi and Takashi Yamabuki, who after a long time meet each other again at an amateur Shooto mixed martial arts contest. While Meguru only practices MMA for fun, Takashi is pursuing a serious goal. Even though each of them has their own reason to fight, both are becoming stronger with each match… Universally praised for its realism and accurate depiction of martial arts, All-Rounder Meguru is one of the first manga to provide a glimpse into the energetic and exciting world of modern MMA.
description.pt-br: A história desenrola-se à volta de Meguru Takayanagi, que está à procura de um estilo de luta “prático” para além do tradicional karatê que ele costumava praticar quando era pequeno. Ele entra então para um ginásio de MMA onde encontra Yudai Kitamura e Maki Kamiya. O seu estilo de luta não tem qualquer tipo de especialidade ou golpe final e ele incorpora movimentos de outros lutadores à medida que o combate se vai desenrolando.

description.en: Izumi Momoko is one of the most popular girls in school, but she has difficulty getting good grades, so her mother decides to hire a private tutor, Izumi's mother receives a recommendation from a friend and hires that friend's son, Minoru Yoshi is Izumi's private tutor on the weekends, but Minoru and Izumi don't know this, the problem is that the two are classmates, how will these adventures be?
description.pt-br: Izumi Momoko é uma das garotas mais populares da escola, mas tem dificuldade em tirar boas notas, então sua mãe decide contratar um professor particular, a mãe de Izumi recebe uma recomendação de uma amiga e contrata o filho dessa amiga, Minoru Yoshi é o professor particular de Izumi nos fins de semana, mas Minoru e Izumi não sabem disso, o problema é que os dois são colegas de classe, como serão essas aventuras?

altTitles.ja: 吸血姫【ヴァンパイア】美夕 朔

description.en: A half-human, half-vampire girl named Miyu is trapped in a body that will remain a teenager forever. As a vampire, it is her duty to hunt down demonic beings known as Shinma who have wandered into the human world and send them back to the Darkness. The new story begins with Miyu transferring to a certain middle school.

title.en: Zennin Ossan, Umarekawattara SSS Rank Jinsei ga Kakutei Shita

altTitles.en: Your SSS-Rank Afterlife Is Confirmed, Virtuous Old Man
As a virtuous middle-aged man, my new life was confirmed to be SSS rank

altTitles.ja: 善人おっさん、生まれ変わったらSSSランク人生が確定した

altTitles.ko: 착한 아재, 다시 태어나니 SSS랭크 인생이 확정됐다

description.en: The virtuous will definitely be rewarded! This world judges the deeds and good karma of your previous life, and grants you a rank when you are reborn. The benevolent man, even surprising the gods through this, decides to be reborn as the son Alexander of a noble family in the same world as his past life, and thus starts his SSS-Rank life! Follow Alec's journey as he lives his life as a SSS Rank!!

altTitles.th: ฤทธิ์ดาบไม้ไผ่

description.en: Kojiro is an impoverished young teacher and the supervisor of his high school’s kendo club. He doesn’t have the leeway to spend time on his students–he can barely feed himself as it is. So when an old friend makes him a bet with an entire year’s worth of deluxe sushi on the line, Kojiro finds a new purpose in life: to beat his friend’s kendo team! But before he can arrange a kendo meet for both schools’ kendo teams, he needs to actually put together a five-woman squad–and the first girl he needs is Tamaki Kawazoe, kendo athlete extraordinaire and daughter of an elite kendo dojo master. The problem is, she isn’t really interested in doing kendo for fun. What can Kojiro do to convince her to join the team?

Taiki Inomata is on the boys' badminton team at sports powerhouse Eimei Junior and Senior High. He's in love with basketball player Chinatsu Kano, the older girl he trains alongside every morning in the gym. One Spring day, their relationship takes a sharp turn ... And thus begins this brand-new series of love, sports and youth!

---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media (2023)
description.fr:
Taiki Inomata, membre du club de badminton, a eu le coup de foudre pour Chinatsu Kano, la star du club de basket de son établissement. Il s'entraîne à ses côtés tous les matins. Sa relation avec Chinatsu va prendre un tournant totalement inédit lorsqu'un jour de printemps, une nouvelle des plus déconcertantes va lui offrir une opportunité inespérée de conquérir sa belle.

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Delcourt/Tonkam**
description.ja: バドミントン部に所属する猪股大喜（いのまたたいき）は、女子バスケ部の先輩・鹿野千夏（かのちなつ）に恋をしていた――。自主練を真摯に取り組む姿に心惹かれていたが、思いもよらぬ事実が発覚し…!?　道のりは遠く、想いは近く。
description.kk: Тайки Иномата - спортқа терең бағытталған Еймей орта және жоғары мектебінің бадминтон тобында ойнайды. Ол әр таң сайын мектеп спортзалында онымен бірге жаттығатын Чинацу Кано атты үздік баскетболшы сенпайға ғашық. Бір күні олардың қарым - қатынасы өзгеріске ұшырап, арасындағы қашықтық жойыла бастады... Осылай, көктемнің бір кезінде мектеп спорт залында тағы да бір махаббат, спорт және жастық шақ оқиғасы басталды.
description.tl: Si Taiki Inomata ay nasa boys' badminton team na sports powerhouse ng Eimei Junior at Senior High. In love siya sa basketball player na si Chinatsu Kano, ang babaeng mas matanda sa kaniya na kasama niya magpraktis kada umaga sa gym. Isang araw, ang kanilang relasyon ay biglang nagbago.
description.uk:
Тайкі Іномата — учасник команди з бадмінтону, який вчиться у школі Еймей. Щодня він намагається прийти до школи якомога раніше, але його завжди випереджає Чінацу Кано, в яку він закоханий.

Чінацу — зірка команди з баскетболу. Хоч Тайкі добре грає в бадмінтон, він далеко не настільки популярний, як Чінацу, що робить шанси на взаємну симпатію низькими. Але за дивним поворотом долі Чінацу починає жити в його будинку.
description.vi:
Taiki Inomata, năm ba sơ trung, là thành viên của đội cầu lông. Kể từ khi tập luyện cùng với đội cầu lông, cậu luôn cố đến sớm nhất có thể, thế nhưng, cậu chỉ là người thứ hai đến nhà đa năng. Bởi vì người đầu tiên luôn đến sớm nhất, chính là Chinatsu Kano, năm nhất cao trung, và là người mà cậu thích.

Vì sự chênh lệch giữa mức độ nổi tiếng mà cậu cảm thấy mình không thể kéo gần khoảng cách với cô ấy. Thế nhưng...

Vào một ngày đẹp trời, vì chuyện gia đình, Chinatsu Kano đã đến sống chung với Taiki Inomata.

Với cơ hội ngàn năm có một này, với cái flag romcom to hơn núi Phú Sĩ này, liệu rằng cậu chàng Taiki có thể làm nên chuyện hay không?
description.es-la: Taiki Inomata forma parte del equipo masculino de bádminton en el prestigioso instituto deportivo Eimei Junior y Senior High. Su corazón late por Chinatsu Kano, la hábil jugadora de baloncesto con la que comparte entrenamientos matutinos en el gimnasio. En un día primaveral, su relación da un giro sorprendente… Y así se inicia esta nueva serie que combina amor, deportes y la efervescencia de la juventud.
description.pt-br: Taiki Inomata está na equipe de Badminton dos meninos na Powerhouse Esportiva Eimei Junior e Senior High. Ele está apaixonado por jogador de basquete Chinatsu Kano, a menina mais velha que ele treina ao lado de todas as manhãs no ginásio. Um dia de primavera, seu relacionamento tem uma virada acentuada ... e assim começa esta nova série de amor, esportes e jovens!

description.en:
The manga starts off with a very odd killing. Then, it jumps to a few days later where Yousuke ends up breaking a small shrine. It later gives him the guardian Suzaku - just in time too, for he must face the murderer that opened the manga.

Note: Retail links are for the New Edition which has 8 volumes instead of 12.

altTitles.ja: 死して生きるSSS級ハンター

altTitles.th: นักล่าพลีชีพ ระดับ SSS

description.de:
In dem mysteriösen, einem RPG Dungeon ähnelnden Turm lebt der alle berühmten Hunter beneidende Gong-Ja Kim sein alltägliches Leben.
Eines Tages wird sein Wunsch nach mehr mit einem legendären Skill beantwortet, mit dem er die Fähigkeiten anderer kopieren kann ... auf Kosten seines eigenen Lebens.
Bevor er einen Sinn daraus ziehen kann, wird er vom Rang 1 Hunter, dem Flame Emperor, ermordet!
Das aktiviert aber seinen Skill und nun besitzt er einen neuen, nämlich die Möglichkeit, durch seinen Tod in der Zeit zurückzureisen.
Wie wird Gong-Ja dieses Skills nutzen, um seine Konkurrenz zu überflügeln und die Spitze zu erreichen?
description.en:
In the mysterious, RPG dungeon-like Tower, Gongja Kim lives a mundane existence, envying all the star hunters. One day, his wish for more is granted with a legendary skill to copy others’ abilities… at the cost of his life. Before he can make sense of it, he’s killed by the #1 hunter, the Flame Emperor! But this activates his skill and now he’s copied a new one, the ability to travel back in time upon death.

How will Gongja use these skills to outplay the competition and rise to the top?
description.id:
Sebuah menara tiba-tiba muncul di dunia. Dari sisi mana pun di bumi, menara tersebut tetap terlihat menembus horizon. Berbagai monster memenuhi tiap lantai yang ada di menara itu. Orang yang masuk dalam menara itu ternyata bisa mendapatkan skill! Semua orang akhirnya berbondong-bondong untuk memburu para monster dan menjadi hunter kelas dunia.

"Tapi aku hanya hunter kelas F yang tidak punya skill apa-apa, aku juga mau skill kelas S! Tunggu..."

CRING!

"Itu... Kartu emas? Akhirnya kemunculan skill-ku datang juga?"

[Skill Level S+]
[BISA MENDUPLIKASI SKILL ORANG YANG MEMBUNUHMU, HANYA TERAKTIVASI KETIKA KAMU MATI]

"Skill ini... Apa gunanya skill semacam ini?!"

---
- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/SSS-Class-Revival-Hunter/46)
description.ja:
Fランクのおちこぼれハンター「孔子」 ランキング１位の「炎帝」を妬む日々を過ごしていた孔子は、ある日「敵のスキルをコピーできる」というS級スキルを手に入れる。 しかし喜びも束の間、このスキル…何かがおかしい！！ なに！？発動条件がオレの死…？最高のハンターを目指す孔子の挑戦が始まる…！

---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/65543)
description.ko:
F급 말단 헌터 ‘김공자‘.
랭킹 1위 ‘염제‘를 부러워하던 어느 날, 무려 S+급 스킬을 얻는다.
하지만 기쁨도 잠시, 어째 스킬 내용이 이상하다?!
 
상대의 스킬 중 1개를 복사한다,까지는 좋은데…
 
"뭐? 내가 죽어야만 발동된다고?!"
 
죽어야 사는 헌터의 인간찬가 <SSS급 죽어야 사는 헌터>

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/SSS%EA%B8%89-%EC%A3%BD%EC%96%B4%EC%95%BC-%EC%82%AC%EB%8A%94-%ED%97%8C%ED%84%B0/2454)
description.th:
เป็นตอนที่ทำให้เสียน้ำตาแบบมากๆตั้งแต่พาเนลที่พระเอกเดินเข้ามาในบ้านยันตอนสุดท้ายที่ปลอบโยนดวงวิญญาณ ไม่ใช่การกำจัดบอสเพราะต้อง"กำจัด"เพียงอย่างเดียว แต่พระเอกตกตระกอนความคิดตอนเห็นเรื่องราวในอดีตได้เลยเลือกที่จะกำจัดโดยใช้วิธีปลอบโยนแทน มันแบบ อือ เหมียนหมา

---
- [Official Thai Translation](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%A5%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%9E%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%B5%E0%B8%8A%E0%B8%B5%E0%B8%9E_%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%B0%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%9A_SSS/98)
description.pt-br:
Eu também quero uma habilidade Rank S! Eu quero tanto que eu poderia morrer por isso!

[Você despertou uma habilidade Rank S.] [Mas só funciona quando você morre.]
Eh !? DO QUE ELA VAI SERVIR SE EU JÁ ESTIVER MORTO!?
description.zh-hk:
身處F級底層的獵人「金孔子」
長久以來一直羨慕著排行第一的獵人「炎帝」。
某天，他竟突然獲得了S+級的技能。
不料，短暫開心過後，
他發現這個技能有些古怪?!

「複製對方的其中一種技能」
到這裡都還不錯...

「什麼?竟然要我死了才能發動?!」

重生獵人的人生樂章——
《SSS級死而復生的獵人》

---
- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/SSS%E7%B4%9A%E6%AD%BB%E8%80%8C%E5%BE%A9%E7%94%9F%E7%9A%84%E7%8D%B5%E4%BA%BA/96)

description.en:
Olympic track star. MIT whiz-kid. Adored by the beautiful co-ed's. Revered by classmates and teammates alike. Yu was sitting on top of the world.  
  
That is, until the evil seductress Payetta, leader of an outlaw gang of boozers and brawlers, kidnaps Yu at knifepoint and steals him away to her hideout. He learns he's actually the son of Gilgamesh, the legendary founder and ruler of the ancient yet highly advanced civilization of Agartha. The history lesson doesn't stop there, though. Payetta claims to be the granddaughter of Adolf Hitler and wants to share her maniacal dreams with Yu and the new dystopia she plans to create.

Swimming diving competitions are harsh competitions in which the impact from the water surface can be as much as 1 ton when diving from a height of 10 meters.

Mizuha Shiozaki, a transfer student in Class A of Shirasagi High School, is a girl who has won many classical ballet competitions and is called a ``genius.''
However, she was unable to keep up with the strict guidance of her mother, who was a world-famous prima donna, and quit ballet in her third year of junior high school due to her resentment towards her mother.She thought she would spend her high school life in a relaxed and fun way, but inside she had a complex that she had run away from ballet and her mother.

One day, an argument with Himeko Sawamura, a second-year student who is her childhood friend and unrequited love, causes her to jump off a 10-meter diving board, causing her to lose her temper.

Shirasagi High School is the only high school in Tokyo that has a "diving club,'' and Himeko was an athlete who was nicknamed "Ice Princess'' and was even selected as a candidate for Japan's Olympic team.

Mizuha climbed onto the diving board but balked at the height due to fear. However, this ignites Mizuha's competitive spirit and she becomes obsessed with diving competitions.

A masterpiece sports manga depicting the bright and single-minded appearance of a girl who stakes her youth on diving competitions!

Losing a loved one is so painful that one may sometimes wish to be able to resurrect them—a weakness that the enigmatic Millennium Earl exploits. To make his mechanical weapons known as "Akuma," he uses the souls of the dead that are called back. Once a soul is placed in an Akuma, it is trapped forever, and the only way to save them is to exorcise them from their vessel using the Anti-Akuma weapon, "Innocence."  
  
After spending three years as the disciple of General Cross, Allen Walker is sent to the Black Order—an organization comprised of those willing to fight Akuma and the Millennium Earl—to become an official Exorcist. With an arm as his Innocence and a cursed eye that can see the suffering souls within an Akuma, it's up to Allen and his fellow Exorcists to stop the Millennium Earl's ultimate plot: one that can lead to the destruction of the world.
description.ru: Действие манги разворачивается в альтернативной Европе конца 19 века. Мир заселен Акума - созданиями Тысячелетнего Графа, созданными из механизма и человеческой души. Те, кто могут уничтожать Акума и освобождать души заключенные в них, называются экзорцистами, которые наделены некой Чистой Силой. Главный герой манги - Аллен Уолкер, юноша пятнадцати лет, проклятый Акума, носитель Чистой Силы в его левой руке. Путь Аллена Уолкера связан с его любовью к людям и Акума, путь, который принесет ему много неожиданностей…
description.pt-br:
Perder um ente querido é tão doloroso que às vezes podemos desejar ressuscitá-lo - uma fraqueza que o enigmático Conde do Millennium explora. Para tornar suas armas mecânicas conhecidas como “Akuma”, ele usa as almas dos mortos que são chamadas de volta. Uma vez que uma alma é colocada em um Akuma, ela fica presa para sempre, e a única maneira de salvá-la é exorcizá-la de seu recipiente usando a arma Anti-Akuma, "Inocência".

Depois de passar três anos como discípulo do General Cross, Allen Walker é enviado para a Ordem Negra – uma organização composta por aqueles dispostos a lutar contra Akuma e o Conde do Milênio – para se tornar um Exorcista oficial. Com um braço como sua Inocência e um olho amaldiçoado que pode ver as almas sofredoras dentro de um Akuma, cabe a Allen e seus colegas Exorcistas impedir a trama final do Conde do Millennium: uma que pode levar à destruição do mundo.

description.en:
The story follows the life of a teenage boy named "Mesh," so-called for his unique "mesh"-colored hair: blonde with silver strands on the sides. It begins with a scene where Mesh, after being beaten, escapes from a mob and encounters Milon, a forger and painter. Mesh ends up staying at Milon’s house, and the two form an unlikely bond as they navigate life together. Each chapter is a poetic blend of crime, peaceful everyday moments, or the vibrant nightlife of artists in a fictionalized Paris.

"Mesh" is regarded as one of Hagio Moto’s defining works, marking a pivotal shift in her artistic style. It was her first series to adopt a more realistic look while retaining the ethereal beauty characteristic of 1970s shōjo art. The story ventures into more mature themes while continuing to explore Hagio's recurring motifs, such as parent-child relationships and adolescence.
description.vi:
"Mesh" kể về một phần tuổi niên thiếu của cậu bé cùng tên, biệt danh bắt nguồn từ mái tóc vàng pha bạc đặc trưng. Câu chuyện mở đầu với cảnh Mesh vừa bị xã hội đen hành hung, tình cờ gặp Milon, một họa sĩ chuyên vẽ tranh nhái. Mesh ở lại nhà Milon, và giữa hai người hình thành một mối liên kết kỳ lạ. Mỗi chương là sự kết hợp đầy chất thơ giữa thế giới tội phạm, những khoảnh khắc đời thường yên bình, và nhịp sống sôi động của các nghệ sĩ tại một Paris huyền ảo được Hagio phác họa.

Tác phẩm này được coi là dấu mốc quan trọng trong sự nghiệp của Hagio Moto, đánh dấu sự chuyển mình lớn trong phong cách nghệ thuật của cô. Đây là loạt truyện đầu tiên của cô mang nét vẽ hiện thực hơn, trong khi vẫn giữ được nét mềm mại đặc trưng của dòng shōjo những năm 1970. Câu chuyện khai thác các chủ đề trưởng thành hơn trước, đồng thời tiếp tục đào sâu những motif quen thuộc trong sáng tác của Hagio, như mối quan hệ cha mẹ - con cái và các vấn đề tâm lý tuổi trẻ.

description.en:
Tatsuya Uesugi, the older brother who has no relationship with the word "hard work," and Kazuya Uesugi, the younger brother who tries his hardest in everything he does. 

They are twin brothers. They have known Minami Asakura, the only daughter of the neighboring coffee shop "Minamikaze" since childhood. You can't take your eyes off the "youth" of these three...!


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media (2008)

---
- **Won the 28th Shogakukan Manga Award for Shonen**

title.en: The Greatest Philosopher With Zero Magic Power.

altTitles.ja-ro: Maryoku 0 de Saikyou no Daikenja - Sore wa Mahou dewa Nai, Butsuri da!
Maryoku Zero de Saikyou no Daikenja: Sore wa Mahou de wa Nai, Butsuri da!

altTitles.ja: 魔力0で最強の大賢者～それは魔法ではない、物理だ！～

description.en:
On his deathbed, the Great Philosopher expressed remorse, as he was never able to learn magic.   
  
Five hundred years later, he was reborn as Mazel Loran, the son of a feudal lord. His family believe him to be a late bloomer in terms of his magic, but also think he’s the next incarnation of the Great Philosopher. But Mazel has a secret that nobody else knows: while he does not have any magic, he has experience with “physics”!

title.en: I Eat Soft Rice in Another World

description.en: Zhang Hao fainted upon witnessing the once-in-a-century blood moon. When he came to, he realised that the entire world had changed...... Gender roles and concepts had completely switched, from marrying off females to marrying off males, with the female side even having to pay bride dowry. Women working to put food on the table and men being househusbands had become commonplace, and the women without a car or a house are now not only looked down upon, but also hard-pressed to find themselves a man. A woman pursuing a man is not worth batting an eyelid, but the reverse can raise eyebrows...... "Even in this world where chicks all chase after me, I insist on being a real man!"

Historie takes place in ancient Greece and follows the life of Eumenes and his childhood, who would later in his life grow up to be the secretary and general to Alexander the Great.  
  
**IMPORTANT:**   
- Hitoshi Iwaaki frequently redoes the art for volume releases as well as add smaller chapters together.   
- There are no missing chapters on MangaDex, Chapter 108 "Warped" immediately follows Chapter 97 "Disposal of Olympias (2)", this is because chapters were added together in previous volumes, so the chapter count between volume and magazine are out of sync.  
  
---
- **Won the 16th Osamu Tezuka Cultural Prize's Grand Prize in 2012 for Manga**  
-  **Won the 14th Japan Media Arts Festival Grand Prize for Manga**
description.ja: 『寄生獣』で世を震撼させた岩明均氏が漫画家としてデビューする前から温めていた物語、それがこの『ヒストリエ』。舞台は紀元前、後にアレキサンダー大王の書記官となるエウメネスの波乱に満ちた生涯を描いた歴史大作です。蛮族スキタイの出身でありながらそれを知らず、都市国家カルディアでギリシア人養父母に育てられたエウメネスは、そのおかげでギリシア的教養を身につけることとなる。ある日養父がスキタイ人に殺され、自分の出自を知ったエウメネスは奴隷の身分に落とされてしまう。それが彼の波乱の旅の始まりだったのです。
description.pt-br: Historie se passa na Grécia Antiga e traça a desconhecida juventude de Eumênio de Cárdia, secretário e general de Alexandre, O Grande. Acompanhando sua infância até seu encontro com Alexandre, o autor entrelaça muitos acontecimentos históricos da antiguidade, criando um perfil audacioso e carismático de um homem que estava à frente de seu tempo, dando uma nova perspectiva sobre seu caráter, modo de pensar, suas conquistas e o legado que deixou.

description.en: Kai Nihonkai, a high school student living in a rural town, tries to run away from the town with Yuki, a woman who is about to be forced into a political marriage, but the chase ends in failure. Nihonkai, who has become uncomfortable in his hometown due to the eloping scandal, cuts off the relationship with his father, who is the chief priest of the temple, and leaves his hometown alone to meet various women.

altTitles.ja: ナイトメア・メーカー

altTitles.ja-ro: Sekai wa Subete Kimi no Mono

description.en: Uchida is a high school student genius who created a device that is supposed to make people have good dreams but he always had bad dreams when he tried it on himself. One day, he caught the school doctor sleeping at the clinic and decided to try the device on her. It turned out that it works surprisingly well on her and that she wanted to buy the device from him. He then tries it on his classmates and it became quite popular with the rest of the class as people start lining up to borrow it. Meanwhile, there is growing concern that users of the device are starting to have difficulties differentiating dreams from reality…
description.ja: 天才発明家高校生の内田は､夢に願望を投影できる夢見装置を開発｡誰もが装置の虜になっていく､レム催眠誘導型リアル体感システム始動!!

description.en:
Gol D. Roger, a man referred to as the "Pirate King," is set to be executed by the World Government. But just before his demise, he confirms the existence of a great treasure, One Piece, located somewhere within the vast ocean known as the Grand Line. Announcing that One Piece can be claimed by anyone worthy enough to reach it, the Pirate King is executed and the Great Age of Pirates begins.  
  
Twenty-two years later, a young man by the name of Monkey D. Luffy is ready to embark on his own adventure, searching for One Piece and striving to become the new Pirate King. Armed with just a straw hat, a small boat, and an elastic body, he sets out on a fantastic journey to gather his own crew and a worthy ship that will take them across the Grand Line to claim the greatest status on the high seas.

---

**Note:**  
**Because a takedown notice was sent to MangaDex from the owners of this series, English fan translations of One Piece are unable to be posted at this time. The series can be read in its entirety at [the official Shonen Jump website,](https://www.viz.com/shonenjump/chapters/one-piece) with the first and latest three chapters available at any time and the rest accessible with a Shonen Jump membership (which costs about $2 a month and can be accessed via a VPN if you are outside the US). The three most recent chapters can also be read on MangaPlus for free by clicking the chapter links below.**

---
- **The Best-Selling Manga in History**
- **Won the 41st Japan Cartoonists Association Award Grand Prize alongside Neko Darake in 2012** 
- **Received the Kumamoto Prefecture Honorary Prize in 2018**
description.es: Hace veintidós años, el legendario pirata, Gold D. Roger fue ejecutado. Sus últimas palabras fueron que su tesoro conocido como "One Piece" estaba escondido en algún lugar dentro del vasto océano conocido como Grand Line. Esto dio inicio a la Era de los Piratas. Ahora, Monkey D. Luffy, un joven que, inspirado por su ídolo de la infancia emprende su viaje buscando el One Piece y convertirse en el Rey de los Piratas.
description.ru: Последние слова, произнесённые Королем Пиратов Гол Д. Роджером перед казнью, вдохновили многих выйти в море: «Мои сокровища? Я завещаю их тому, кто сможет их найти. Ищите! Я все оставил в одном месте!». Лишённые сна и покоя люди ринулись на Гранд Лайн, самое опасное место в мире. Так началась великая эра пиратов… Но с каждым годом романтиков становилось все меньше, их постепенно вытесняли прагматичные пираты-разбойники, которым награбленное добро было куда ближе, чем какие-то «никчёмные мечты». Но вот, одним прекрасным днем, семнадцатилетний Монки Д. Луффи исполнил заветную мечту детства - отправился в море. Его цель — ни много, ни мало стать новым Королём Пиратов. За достаточно короткий срок юному капитану удаётся собрать команду, состоящую из не менее амбициозных искателей приключений. И пусть ими движут совершенно разные устремления, главное, этим ребятам важны не столько деньги и слава, сколько куда более ценное – принципы и верность друзьям. И ещё – служение Мечте. Что же, пока по Гранд Лайн плавают такие люди, Великая Эра Пиратов всегда будет с нами!
description.uk:
Король піратів Ґолд Роджер буде страчений Світовим урядом. Прямо перед смертю він підтвердив існування великого скарбу «Ван Піс», який знаходиться десь на величезному морі Ґранд Лайн. Як тільки Роджер сказав, що будь-хто гідний досягти Ван Пісу може забрати його собі, його стратили, і почалася Велика ера піратів.

Двадцять два роки потому, молодий хлопець на ім’я Монкі Д. Луффі готовий почати свою пригоду по пошуку Ван Пісу та здобуванню титулу Короля піратів. Маючи при собі солом’яну шапку, невеличкий човен та еластичне тіло, він вирушає у неймовірну подорож, щоб зібрати собі команду та хороший корабель, який зможе пронести їх через весь Ґранд Лайн, щоб стати найвеличнішими в усіх морях.
description.es-la: Hace veintidós años, el legendario pirata, Gold D. Roger fue ejecutado. Sus últimas palabras fueron que su tesoro conocido como "One Piece" estaba escondido en algún lugar dentro del vasto océano conocido como Grand Line. Esto dio inicio a la Era de los Piratas. Ahora, Monkey D. Luffy, un joven que, inspirado por su ídolo de la infancia emprende su viaje buscando el One Piece y convertirse en el Rey de los Piratas.
description.pt-br: One Piece começa quando Gol D. Roger, o Rei Dos Piratas que possuiu tudo nesse mundo, antes de ser executado, diz que escondeu o seu tesouro em algum lugar da Grand Line, um oceano extremamente perigoso. Desde então muitos piratas se aventuram pela Grand Line para tentar encontrar o tesouro chamado One Piece. Um deles é Monkey D. Luffy, o garoto que, acidentalmente, comeu uma das Akuma No Mi, a Gomu Gomu No Mi (Fruta da Borracha), e agora ele pode esticar seu corpo como se fosse uma borracha. A jornada dele começa atrás de companheiros e um barco, que ele vai conseguindo pouco a pouco, pois tem um objetivo: Ser o Rei Dos Piratas!!

altTitles.en: There Are No Red Flowers for Ten Days

altTitles.es-la: Venganza de la Flor de Ciruelo

description.en:
The scripture that brought a bloodstorm to Jianghu was the "Wisdom of the Secret Master," a legendary book that is said to hold the power to seize all the world's authority and wealth. Because of it, Woonseon lost all his loved ones overnight. 
Now, he casts aside his bright and pure past and embarks on a desperate journey for revenge. The flower will wither in ten days. Nothing in this world will be eternal, whether it's wealth, power, or love.

title.en: Mahouka Koukou no Rettousei - Shizoku Kaigi-hen

altTitles.es-la: Mahouka Koukou no Rettousei -  La Conferencia de los Clanes Maestros

description.en:
At the Yotsuba New Year's gathering, Miyuki was names as the successor whilst Tatsuya was named her fiancé. Tatsuya and Miyuki's non-sibling relationship and engagement are now public knowledge. Among the shocked students the most shocked are those that knew the siblings.  
Meanwhile, the Ten Master Clans selection meeting, followed by magicians all over the world, is due to take place at a hotel in Hokone.  
  
Adaptation of the original novel's volumes 17-19.
description.es:
La sucesión al los Yotsuba y el compromiso de Shiba Miyuki se anunció a la comunidad mágica. Sin embargo, la Familia Ichijou de los Diez Clanes Maestros presentó una objeción. Mientras tanto, la atmósfera en la Preparatoria de Magia, el aire de respeto por los hermanos Shiba, que habían ocultado sus identidades, está siendo evitado, y Tatsuya y Miyuki se están aislando. ¡Un nuevo episodio que describe la nueva relación entre los dos ha sido adaptado a un cómic por el nuevo Takeda Hazumi!  
  
Adaptación de los volúmenes 17-19 de la novela ligera original.
